name: Arugula and Carrot Salad With Walnuts and Cheese
description: The best type of arugula for this salad is the feathery type called wild arugula. I love the contrast of flavors here — peppery arugula alongside sweet carrots and a nutty dressing.
keywords: arugula, carrot, walnut, healthy, raw, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup grated Parmesan or crumbled blue cheese (1 ounce)
1 small garlic clove, pureed or finely minced optional

recipeInstructions.text: Combine the arugula, carrots, walnuts, cheese and tarragon in a salad bowl.
In a small bowl or measuring cup, combine the lemon juice, vinegars, salt and mustard. Whisk together, and add the garlic. Whisk in the oils.
Shortly before serving, toss the salad with the dressing.
